summary: The Who is an English rock band formed in 1964, known for their powerful live shows and innovative music. The classic lineup included Roger Daltrey (vocals), Pete Townshend (guitar), John Entwistle (bass), and Keith Moon (drums). They influenced many other bands with their unique sound, including the use of synthesizers and power chords. The Who's albums, like "Tommy" and "Quadrophenia," were very successful. After Moon's death in 1978, the band continued with different members. They reunited in 1999 and still perform today.
title: The Who
